/contracts/Affiliate/AffiliateProgram.so.devdoc: {"methods":{"credit(address,uint256)":{"details":"credit accepts eth and credits the affiliate's balance for the amount","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to credit","_purchaseId":"- the purchaseId of the sale"}},"cutFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"cutFor returns the cut (amount in wei) to give in comission to the affiliate","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to check for","_productId":"- the productId in the sale","_purchaseAmount":"- the purchaseAmount","_purchaseId":"- the purchaseId in the sale"}},"isAffiliateProgram()":{"details":"Exposes that this contract thinks it is an AffiliateProgram"},"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"rateFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"rateFor returns the rate which should be used to calculate the comission for this affiliate/sale combination, in basis points (1/100th of a percent).   *  We may want to completely blacklist a particular address (e.g. a known bad actor affilite). To that end, if the whitelistRate is exactly 1bp, we use that as a signal for blacklisting and return a rate of zero. The upside is that we can completely turn off sending transactions to a particular address when this is needed. The downside is that you can't issued 1/100th of a percent commission. However, since this is such a small amount its an acceptable tradeoff.","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to check for"}},"retire(address)":{"details":"retire - withdraws the entire balance and marks the contract as retired, which prevents unpausing.   * If no new comissions have been deposited for the alotted time, then the owner may pause the program and retire this contract. This may only be performed once as the contract cannot be unpaused.   * We do this as an alternative to selfdestruct, because certain operations can still be performed after the contract has been selfdestructed, such as the owner withdrawing ETH accidentally sent here."},"setBaselineRate(uint256)":{"details":"setBaselineRate - sets the baseline rate for any affiliate that is not whitelisted","params":{"_newRate":"- the rate, in bp (1/100th of a percent) to give any non-whitelisted affiliate. Set to zero to \"turn off\""}},"setMaximumRate(uint256)":{"details":"setMaximumRate - Set the maximum rate for any affiliate, including whitelists. That is, this overrides individual rates.","params":{"_newRate":"- the rate, in bp (1/100th of a percent)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"_newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state. Will not unpause if the contract is retired."},"whitelist(address,uint256)":{"details":"whitelist - white listed affiliates can receive a different  rate than the general public (whitelisted accounts would generally get a  better rate).","params":{"_affiliate":"- the affiliate address to whitelist","_rate":"- the rate, in basis-points (1/100th of a percent) to give this affiliate in each sale. NOTE: a rate of exactly 1 is the signal to blacklist this affiliate. That is, a rate of 1 will set the commission to 0."}},"withdraw()":{"details":"withdraw the msg.sender's balance"},"withdrawFrom(address,address)":{"details":"withdrawFrom allows the owner to withdraw an affiliate's unclaimed ETH, after the alotted time.   * This function can be called even if the contract is paused","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate","_to":"- the address to send ETH to"}}}}

/contracts/LicenseAccessControl.sol:Lice.devdoc: {"methods":{"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}},"title":"LicenseAccessControl"}
/contracts/LicenseAccessControl.sol:Lice.userdoc: {"methods":{"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"unpause()":{"notice":"called by the CEO to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

/contracts/LicenseBase.sol:LicenseBase.userdoc: {"methods":{"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's attributes"},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's info"},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's productId"},"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"unpause()":{"notice":"called by the CEO to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

/contracts/LicenseCore.sol:LicenseCore.devdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be approved"}},"approveAll(address)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID"}},"approvedFor(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of"},"return":"address currently approved to take ownership of the given token ID"},"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the balance of"},"return":"uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address"},"clearInventory(uint256)":{"details":"decrementInventory verifies inventory levels, whereas this method simply sets the inventory to zero. This is useful, for example, if an executive wants to take a product off the market quickly. There could be a race condition with decrementInventory where a product is sold, which could cause the admins decrement to fail (because it may try to decrement more than available).","params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"createProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_initialInventoryQuantity":"- the initial inventory (inventory can be changed)","_initialPrice":"- the starting price (price can be changed)","_productId":"- the id of the product to use (cannot be changed)","_supply":"- the total supply - use `0` for \"unlimited\" (cannot be changed)"}},"decrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to decrement","_productId":"- the product id"}},"disapproveAll(address)":{"details":"Note that this only removes the operator approval and does not clear any independent, specific approvals of token transfers to this address","params":{"_to":"address to be disapproved for the given token ID"}},"incrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to increment","_productId":"- the product id"}},"isOperatorApprovedFor(address,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"operator address which you want to query the approval of","_owner":"owner address which you want to query the approval of"},"return":"bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner"},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of"},"return":"owner address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID"},"purchase(uint256,address,address)":{"params":{"_affiliate":"- the address to of the affiliate - use address(0) if none","_assignee":"- the address to assign the purchase to (doesn't have to be msg.sender)","_productId":"- the product to purchase"}},"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_price":"- the product price","_productId":"- the product id"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"takeOwnership(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token being claimed by the msg.sender"}},"tokensOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the tokens of"},"return":"uint256[] representing the list of tokens owned by the passed address"},"totalSupply()":{"return":"uint256 representing the total amount of tokens"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to receive the ownership of the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be transferred"}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_from":"The address that owns the token","_to":"The address that will take ownership of the token. Can be any address, including the caller","_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be transferred"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}},"title":"LicenseCore is the entry point of the contract"}
/contracts/LicenseCore.sol:LicenseCore.userdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Approves another address to claim for the ownership of the given token ID"},"approveAll(address)":{"notice":"Approves another address to claim for the ownership of any tokens owned by this account"},"approvedFor(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets the approved address to take ownership of a given token ID"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Gets the balance of the specified address"},"clearInventory(uint256)":{"notice":"clearInventory clears the inventory of a product."},"createProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"createProduct creates a new product in the system"},"decrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"decrementInventory removes inventory levels for a product"},"disapproveAll(address)":{"notice":"Removes approval for another address to claim for the ownership of any tokens owned by this account."},"incrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"incrementInventory - increments the inventory of a product"},"isOperatorApprovedFor(address,address)":{"notice":"Tells whether an operator is approved by a given owner"},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's attributes"},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's info"},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's productId"},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets the owner of the specified token ID"},"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"priceOf(uint256)":{"notice":"anyone *"},"purchase(uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Purchase - makes a purchase of a product. Requires that the value sent is exactly the price of the product"},"setAffiliateProgramAddress(address)":{"notice":"executives *"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"setPrice - sets the price of a product"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"takeOwnership(uint256)":{"notice":"Claims the ownership of a given token ID"},"tokensOf(address)":{"notice":"Gets the list of tokens owned by a given address"},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"Gets the total amount of tokens stored by the contract"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another address"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer a token owned by another address, for which the calling address has previously been granted transfer approval by the owner."},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

/contracts/LicenseInventory.sol:LicenseI.devdoc: {"methods":{"clearInventory(uint256)":{"details":"decrementInventory verifies inventory levels, whereas this method simply sets the inventory to zero.
